last_episode_to_air.name: The Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the Season 2 finale, the final four face their biggest competition yet—each other

name: The Four: Battle for Stardom
overview: Four super-talented and fiercely competitive singers, chosen from their auditions by the show’s panel of music industry experts, will try to defend their coveted spots on the stage, as they are challenged individually by new singers determined to replace them.

episodes.name: Week One
episodes.overview: Four recording artists are guided by musician Fergie, as they vie to keep their place in the competition to become iHeartRadio's "On the Verge" artist.

episodes.name: Week Two
episodes.overview: A new set of challengers face off against The Four, determined to take their coveted seats in front of a panel of industry experts

episodes.name: Week Four
episodes.overview: A new set of challengers face off against the Four, determined to take their coveted seats

episodes.name: Week Five
episodes.overview: A new set of challengers face off against the Four, determined to take their coveted seats

episodes.name: Finale
episodes.overview: The final four face their last battle; the winner is named.

episodes.name: Week One
episodes.overview: Four vocal gladiators, spanning all music genres, have been chosen and begin the fight to defend their coveted seats in front of a panel of industry experts.

episodes.name: Week Two
episodes.overview: This week, a new set of determined challengers face-off against the four in front of a panel of industry experts: Grammy® Award-winning musician, record producer and songwriter Sean "Diddy" Combs, record-producing hitmaker DJ Khaled, and Grammy-winning recording artist and songwriter Meghan Trainor. Eight-time Grammy® Award-winning and multi-Platinum solo artist Fergie, will guide the contestants while they battle it out against new artists determined to replace take their spots in the competition. Find out who will move one step forward to the ultimate prize.

episodes.name: Week Three
episodes.overview: This week, a new set of determined challengers face off against The Four in front of a panel of industry experts: Grammy® Award-winning musician, record producer and songwriter Sean "Diddy" Combs, record-producing hitmaker DJ Khaled and Grammy-winning recording artist and songwriter Meghan Trainor. Eight-time Grammy® Award-winning and multi-Platinum solo artist Fergie, will guide the contestants, while they battle it out against new artists determined to win their seat in the competition. Find out who will move one step forward to the ultimate prize.

episodes.name: Week Four
episodes.overview: This week, a new set of determined challengers face off against The Four in front of a panel of industry experts: Grammy® Award-winning musician, record producer and songwriter Sean "Diddy" Combs, record-producing hitmaker DJ Khaled and Grammy-winning recording artist and songwriter Meghan Trainor. Eight-time Grammy® Award-winning and multi-Platinum solo artist Fergie, will guide the contestants, while they battle it out against new artists determined to win their seat in the competition. Find out who will move one step forward to the ultimate prize.

episodes.name: Week Five
episodes.overview: A new set of challengers face off against the Four.

episodes.name: Week Six
episodes.overview: A new set of challengers face off against the Four, determined to take their coveted seats

episodes.name: Comeback Week
episodes.overview: Several fan favorites from Season 2 return for one last chance to land a seat in the finale

episodes.name: The Finale
